dialogueTree.title: Siileng: ""The shine on these sunglasses last..."
dialogueTree.text: "The shine on these sunglasses lasts a lifetime, officer! One hundred percent guaranteed!"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Stylish shades, huh? They'd be even..."
links.text: Stylish shades, huh? They'd be even more stylish if you paid for them with net worth. Go over and ask him.

links.title: You: "Try the shades on."
links.text: Try the shades on.

links.title: Box of Sunglasses: "Abort! These are hideous. What's mo..."
links.text: Abort! These are hideous. What's more, they don't even fit your face. You can feel them pinching your nose and chafing against your brow.

links.title: Siileng: ""Damn, officer, you look like a meg..."
links.text: "Damn, officer, you look like a mega-secret spy, very secret," the man nods eagerly. "They're practically made for you. I'll let you have them for... two reál and fifty cents!"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "They're perfect for concealing your..."
links.text: They're perfect for concealing your bloodshot and baggy eyes.

links.title: Composure: "It's going to be very difficult for..."
links.text: It's going to be very difficult for anyone to take you seriously with these things on your face.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No," the lieutenant gently removes..."
links.text: "No," the lieutenant gently removes the glasses from your face, setting you free again. "You're definitely not buying those."

links.title: You: ""Don't tell me what to do, Kim. I l..."
links.text: "Don't tell me what to do, Kim. I like those sunglasses."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I can't... We can't walk aroun..."
links.text: "No, I can't... We can't walk around with you looking like this." His hand has already risen mid-air, but he stops. "Okay, fine. Go ahead. If you want to look like a walking mid-life crisis, then who am I to interfere?"

links.title: Volition: "The lieutenant's reverse psychology..."
links.text: The lieutenant's reverse psychology fourberie doesn't work on you. If you want to look like a mega-secret mid-life crisis, that's your choice.

links.title: You: ""You're right, I'm too sensible for..."
links.text: "You're right, I'm too sensible for those."

links.title: Siileng: ""Are you sure? But they look so goo..."
links.text: "Are you sure? But they look so good on you!" The street vendor frowns. "You should think this through, officer."

links.title: You: "Rummage through the box."
links.text: Rummage through the box.

links.title: Box of Sunglasses: "These are all boring. Boring third-..."
links.text: These are all boring. Boring third-rate ho-hum sunglasses made of cheap Seraise plastic. The kind of plastic that melts in the sun.

links.title: Drama: "Those UV-stickers are almost certai..."
links.text: Those UV-stickers are almost certainly just there for show. If anything, these lenses probably direct more UV light *into* your pupils -- a UV magnifier.

links.title: Siileng: ""These are all first-rate sunglasse..."
links.text: "These are all first-rate sunglasses!" the man declares. "Premium design, superb material, *very cool* UV-resistant! These will definitely keep your eyes safe *and* cool while doing your dangerous police work."

links.title: You: "Try again, maybe you can find *some..."
links.text: Try again, maybe you can find *some* interesting sunglasses in the box.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Ah, I see... A pair of waterblue sh..."
links.text: Ah, I see... A pair of waterblue shades. The writing on the left temple says: "Sub-Insulindic Rendezvous." The frame appears to be hand-carved out of bone.

links.title: Siileng: ""Oh, very interesting choice, offic..."
links.text: "Oh, very interesting choice, officer, very *high-culture*..." For the first time the street vendor's voice trails off, as he watches you inspect the glasses.

links.title: You: "Try them on."
links.text: Try them on.

links.title: Conceptualization: "This is how a sea monster sees the..."
links.text: This is how a sea monster sees the world. You've become a sea monster -- giant, hidden and... strangely tender at heart. All is blue.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Alright, but these actually make yo..."
links.text: Alright, but these actually make your vision worse. It's like literally being under water.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes, but they also make your soul q..."
links.text: Yes, but they also make your soul quiver like jello. So deep.

links.title: Siileng: ""Wow, officer, you look so cool," t..."
links.text: "Wow, officer, you look so cool," the street vendor has picked up his pace again, as you observe the world through deep sea-tinted lenses.

links.title: Siileng: ""And they can be yours for a mere t..."
links.text: "And they can be yours for a mere three reál. My regular customers have passed them all up because they've got no taste, but *you* found them..."

links.title: You: ""Kim, what about these?""
links.text: "Kim, what about these?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant tilts his head and s..."
links.text: The lieutenant tilts his head and steps back, eyes narrowed in a thorough examination. It's a case to him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You look like a musician," he decl..."
links.text: "You look like a musician," he declares, eyes still squinted behind his own glasses. "Like a *blind* musician. But you could do worse. Take them if you want."

links.title: You: "Put them back."
links.text: Put them back.

links.title: Siileng: ""What, change your mind, officer?""
links.text: "What, change your mind, officer?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A pity," the lieutenant says. "Tho..."
links.text: "A pity," the lieutenant says. "Those actually weren't half bad."

links.title: Conceptualization: "No luck. All you find is this... li..."
links.text: No luck. All you find is this... lime-coloured cellophane visor? Produced by a bargain sportswear brand called Amphibian, apparently. There's a malformed green frog on its bent cap.

links.title: Siileng: ""Oh, that visor is perfect for you,..."
links.text: "Oh, that visor is perfect for you, officer. It'll definitely keep the sun out of your eyes while you're shooting criminals." The street vendor makes a bang-bang sound. "And all for a mere six reál."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hey, at least it might actually off..."
links.text: Hey, at least it might actually offer some protection against the sun, not like those cheap plastic shades.

links.title: You: "(Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, are..."
links.text: (Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, are firefights something we should be prepared for?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hope not," he says, looking up f..."
links.text: "I hope not," he says, looking up from his browsing.

links.title: You: "Put the visor back."
links.text: Put the visor back.

links.title: Siileng: ""You don't like it? Sure, square-ja..."
links.text: "You don't like it? Sure, square-jaw, no problem. Let's get you some real shades."

links.title: You: ""I'll take those ugly glasses.""
links.text: "I'll take those ugly glasses."

links.title: Siileng: ""A good starter pair, officer! And..."
links.text: "A good starter pair, officer! And when you're ready to upgrade, come back and see me!"

links.title: You: ""I'll take those cool deep blue gla..."
links.text: "I'll take those cool deep blue glasses."

links.title: Siileng: ""A man who knows his style," the st..."
links.text: "A man who knows his style," the street vendor nods. "Much respect."

links.title: You: ""I'll take that Amphibian sports vi..."
links.text: "I'll take that Amphibian sports visor."

links.title: Siileng: ""Sporty *and* practical, officer! G..."
links.text: "Sporty *and* practical, officer! Good choice."

links.title: You: "[Leave for now.]"
links.text: [Leave for now.]

dialogueTree.title: Box of Sunglasses: "There's a pile of cheap sunglasses..."
dialogueTree.text: There's a pile of cheap sunglasses in a small box, a variety of shapes and colours.

links.title: Siileng: ""You like sunglasses, officer? I've..."
links.text: "You like sunglasses, officer? I've got the latest styles, right here!" The vendor takes a pair of sunglasses and sticks them under your nose.
